trans-unit.source: Provides an implementation of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma implementação de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService"> </xref> interface.

trans-unit.source: A BasicDesignerLoader is a complete implementation of a designer loader without anything relating to a persistence format.
trans-unit.target: Um BasicDesignerLoader é uma implementação completa de um carregador de designer sem nada relacionado a um formato de persistência.

trans-unit.source: A BasicDesignerLoader does not dictate either a text or binary persistence, but it does support the following features: - Multiple load dependencies.
trans-unit.target: Um BasicDesignerLoader não indicar um texto ou binária persistência, mas ele suporta os seguintes recursos: - várias dependências de carga.

trans-unit.source: - Tracking changes within the designer.
trans-unit.target: -Monitoramento de alterações no designer.

trans-unit.source: - Deferred idle-time reloading.
trans-unit.target: -Adiada recarregando o tempo ocioso.

trans-unit.source: A BasicDesignerLoader adds two kinds of services to the designer host’s service container: replaceable services and irreplaceable services.
trans-unit.target: Um BasicDesignerLoader adiciona dois tipos de serviços ao contêiner de serviço do host designer: serviços substituíveis e serviços insubstituíveis.

trans-unit.source: You can replace a replaceable service by changing the value of the protected <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir um serviço substituível alterando o valor de protegido <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A>

trans-unit.source: You cannot replace irreplaceable services because their implementations depend on each other.
trans-unit.target: Você não pode substituir serviços insubstituíveis porque suas implementações dependem uns aos outros.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the services that are provided by default.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir descreve os serviços que são fornecidos por padrão.

trans-unit.source: |Default Service|Description| |---------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>|Allows objects to request that the designer reload itself when it is idle.
trans-unit.target: | Serviço padrão | Descrição | |---------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>| Permite que os objetos solicitar que o designer de recarregar quando ele estiver ocioso.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>

trans-unit.source: This is a replaceable service.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager>|Used to serialize and deserialize objects.
trans-unit.target: Este é um serviço substituível. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager>| Usado para serializar e desserializar objetos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager>

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager is added as a service so objects that need to perform serialization can utilize any serialization providers that were added to the serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: O Gerenciador de serialização é adicionado como um serviço para que objetos que precisam para realizar a serialização podem utilizar qualquer provedor de serialização que foram adicionados ao Gerenciador de serialização.

trans-unit.source: This is an irreplaceable service.|
trans-unit.target: Este é um serviço insubstituíveis. |

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Starts the loading process.
trans-unit.target: Inicia o processo de carregamento.

trans-unit.source: This is an implementation of the abstract <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Esta é uma implementação do resumo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to override this method in your own class.
trans-unit.target: Você não precisa substituir este método em sua própria classe.

trans-unit.source: The BeginLoad method performs the following actions: - It verifies that the design surface has not already loaded.
trans-unit.target: O método BeginLoad executa as seguintes ações:-ele verifica a superfície de design ainda não tenha carregado.

trans-unit.source: - On the first call, it adds relevant services and calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Initialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Na primeira chamada, ele adiciona serviços relevantes e chama o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Initialize%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - It calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: -Ele chama o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A>, e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>métodos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the designer loader service has not been removed from the service container, BeginLoad will call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> methods instead of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Se o serviço de carregador de designer não tiver sido removido do contêiner de serviços, BeginLoad chamará o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A>métodos em vez da <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>métodos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this situation, it is the responsibility of the designer loader service to call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Nessa situação, é responsabilidade do serviço de carregador de designer para chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: The designer loader host to load.
trans-unit.target: O host do carregador de designer para carregar.

trans-unit.source: host is .
trans-unit.target: hostis .

trans-unit.source: The designer is already loaded, or BeginLoad has been called with a different designer loader host.
trans-unit.target: O designer já está carregado ou BeginLoad foi chamado com um host diferente de carregador de designer.

trans-unit.source: host has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: hostfoi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos usados pelo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calling the Dispose method does not flush changes to the designer loader.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o método Dispose não liberar alterações para o carregador do designer.

trans-unit.source: If you want changes to be saved, call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> before calling Dispose.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser que as alterações a serem salvas, chame <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>antes de chamar Dispose.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar Dispose quando terminar de usar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método Dispose deixa a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>em um estado inutilizável.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, você deve liberar todas as referências para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>para o coletor de lixo possa recuperar a memória que o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>estava ocupando.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada Dispose antes de liberar sua última referência a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está usando não serão liberados até que o coletor de lixo chame o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables component notification with the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Habilita ou desabilita a notificação de componente com o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable component notification by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader"></xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to disable component notification by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para ativar a notificação de componente, o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader"> </xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para desabilitar a notificação de componente, o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the component notification was enabled prior to this call; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a notificação do componente foi habilitada antes desta chamada; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Flushes pending changes to the designer loader.
trans-unit.target: Libera as alterações pendentes no carregador do designer.

trans-unit.source: If the designer loader has not been loaded or has not been marked as modified, the Flush method returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: Se o carregador de designer não foi carregado ou não tiver sido marcado como modificada, o método de liberação retorna imediatamente.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, Flush asks the serialization manager to create a serialization session and then calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, a liberação solicita que o Gerenciador de serialização para criar uma sessão de serialização e, em seguida, chama <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the requested service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o serviço solicitado.

trans-unit.source: GetService is a helper method that allows classes deriving from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> to access services offered by the designer loader host.
trans-unit.target: GetService é um método auxiliar que permite que classes derivadas de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>para acessar os serviços oferecidos pelo host do carregador de designer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do serviço.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The requested service, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the requested service cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: O serviço solicitado, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o serviço solicitado não pode ser encontrado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes services.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa a serviços.

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method is called the first time <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> is invoked.
trans-unit.target: O método Initialize é chamado da primeira vez <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>é invocado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can add any services necessary to the designer loader host at this time.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar todos os serviços necessários para hospedar o carregador de designer neste momento.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation adds services that <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> provides, so after calling the base implementation you may replace existing services.
trans-unit.target: A implementação base adiciona serviços que <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>oferece, portanto, depois de chamar a implementação base, você pode substituir os serviços existentes.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: You must remove any custom services you add here by overriding <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve remover quaisquer serviços personalizados que você adicionar aqui, substituindo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"> </xref> não foi inicializado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"> </xref> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the designer should be reloaded.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o designer deve ser recarregado.

trans-unit.source: The IsReloadNeeded method is used by some designer loaders to optimize reloading.
trans-unit.target: O método IsReloadNeeded é usado por alguns carregadores de designer para otimizar o recarregamento.

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden if your designer loader supports intelligent reloading.
trans-unit.target: Este método pode ser substituído se o carregador de designer oferece suporte ao recarregar inteligente.

trans-unit.source: Some designer loaders can detect changes made to their underlying document and determine if a reload of the designer is actually necessary.
trans-unit.target: Alguns carregadores de designer podem detectar alterações feitas em seu documento subjacente e determinar se um recarregamento do designer é realmente necessário.

trans-unit.source: If not, they should return `false` from this method.
trans-unit.target: Se não, eles devem retornar `false` deste método.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation always returns `true`, indicating that any call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload%2A> will succeed.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão sempre retorna `true`, que indica que qualquer chamada para <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload%2A>terá êxito.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer should be reloaded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o designer deve ser recarregado. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão sempre retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the loader host.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o host do carregador.

trans-unit.source: This method returns the loader host that was given to this designer loader.
trans-unit.target: Esse método retorna o host do carregador que foi fornecido para o carregador de designer.

trans-unit.source: This can be `null` if <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> has not been called yet, or if this designer loader has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode ser `null` se <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>ainda não foi chamado ou se o carregador de designer foi descartado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> that was passed to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad*> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"> </xref> que foi passado para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad*>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"> </xref> não foi inicializado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"> </xref> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer loader is loading the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o carregador de designer está carregando a superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> class provides the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>, which supports load dependencies.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>classe fornece a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>, que oferece suporte ao carregar dependências.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: This property takes load dependencies into account and will return `true` if there are any outstanding load dependencies.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade tem dependências de carga em conta e irá retornar `true` se houver qualquer dependência de carga pendentes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer loader is currently loading the design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o carregador de designer atualmente está carregando a superfície de design; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the designer has been modified.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o designer foi modificado.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the designer loader has detected that the designer has been modified.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o carregador de designer detectou que o designer foi modificado.

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true` when the designer loader’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> method is called, the designer loader will call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade for `true` quando o carregador de designer <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>método é chamado, o carregador de designer chamará o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer has been modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>,
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o designer foi modificado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>,

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer loader that loading is about to begin.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o carregador do designer que carregamento está prestes a começar.

trans-unit.source: The OnBeginLoad method is invoked to start the loading process.
trans-unit.target: O método OnBeginLoad é chamado para iniciar o processo de carregamento.

trans-unit.source: You should perform any necessary initialization for loading at this time.
trans-unit.target: Você deve executar qualquer inicialização necessária para carregamento no momento.

trans-unit.source: This method should not be used to perform the actual load.
trans-unit.target: Este método não deve ser usado para executar a carga real.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation disables change notifications and sets up the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> for loading.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão desativa as notificações de alteração e configura o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>para carregamento.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: If you implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> to provide dependent load support, you should call OnBeginLoad when the first dependent load occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se você implementar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>para fornecer suporte a carga dependente, você deve chamar OnBeginLoad quando ocorre o primeiro carregamento dependente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> method after the last call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>método após a última chamada para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> and does this for you.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>implementa <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>e faz isso para você.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> is not available when <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> is called, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> will directly call OnBeginLoad.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>não está disponível quando <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>é chamado, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>diretamente chamará OnBeginLoad.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>

trans-unit.source: If you provide your own loader service, or if you choose not to provide a loader service, you are responsible for calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Se você fornecer seu próprio serviço de carregador, ou se você optar por não fornecer um serviço de carregador, você é responsável por chamar esse método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> method will automatically call this, either indirectly by calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A> if <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> is available, or directly if it is not.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>isso indiretamente chamando automaticamente será chamada de método <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A>se <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>estiver disponível, ou diretamente se não for.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer loader that unloading is about to begin.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o carregador do designer que descarregar está prestes a começar.

trans-unit.source: The OnBeginUnload method is invoked when the designer loader is about to unload the document.
trans-unit.target: O método OnBeginUnload é invocado quando o carregador de designer está prestes a descarregar o documento.

trans-unit.source: The document may be unloaded in preparation for reloading, or if the document failed to load.
trans-unit.target: O documento pode ser descarregado em preparação para recarregar, ou se a falha ao carregar o documento.

trans-unit.source: If you added document-specific services in <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>, remove them here.
trans-unit.target: Se você adicionou serviços específicos do documento em <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>ou <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>, remova-os aqui.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer loader that loading is complete.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o carregador do designer que o carregamento for concluído.

trans-unit.source: The OnEndLoad method is invoked when loading is finished.
trans-unit.target: O método OnEndLoad é invocado quando o carregamento for concluído.

trans-unit.source: It is always called, even if an exception is thrown during loading.
trans-unit.target: Ele é chamado, mesmo se uma exceção for lançada durante o carregamento.

trans-unit.source: The value of `successful` will be set to `true` if the load succeeded, or `false` if a fatal error occurred.
trans-unit.target: O valor de `successful` será definida como `true` se a carga for bem-sucedida, ou `false` se ocorreu um erro fatal.

trans-unit.source: The `errors` collection will contain objects that were reported as errors.
trans-unit.target: O `errors` coleção contém objetos que foram relatados como erros.

trans-unit.source: Usually, these objects are exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, esses objetos são exceções.

trans-unit.source: If you implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> to provide dependent load support, you should call the OnEndLoad method after the last call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se você implementar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>para fornecer suporte a carga dependente, você deve chamar o método de OnEndLoad após a última chamada para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> and does this for you.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>implementa <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>e faz isso para você.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> is not available when <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> is called, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> will directly call OnEndLoad after calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>não está disponível quando <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>é chamado <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>diretamente chamará OnEndLoad após chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>

trans-unit.source: This method should be called by the designer loader service when all dependent loads have been completed.
trans-unit.target: Esse método deve ser chamado pelo serviço de carregador de designer quando todas as cargas dependentes tiverem sido concluídas.

trans-unit.source: This stops the loading process that was initiated by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Isso interrompe o processo de carregamento foi iniciado pelo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you provide your own loader service, or if you choose not to provide a loader service, you are responsible for calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Se você fornecer seu próprio serviço de carregador, ou se você optar por não fornecer um serviço de carregador, você é responsável por chamar esse método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> method will automatically call this, either indirectly by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> method if <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> is available, or directly if it is not.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>método automaticamente chamará isso indiretamente chamando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A>método se <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>estiver disponível, ou diretamente se não for.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the load completed successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a carga foi concluída com êxito; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> containing objects (usually exceptions) that were reported as errors.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>que contém objetos (normalmente exceções) que foram relatados como erros.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"> </xref> não foi inicializado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"> </xref> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer loader that the state of the document is about to be modified.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o carregador do designer que o estado do documento está prestes a ser modificado.

trans-unit.source: The OnModifying method is called in response to a component changing, adding, or removing event which indicates that the designer is about to be modified.
trans-unit.target: O método OnModifying é chamado em resposta a uma alteração de componente, adicionando, ou remover o evento que indica que o designer está prestes a ser modificado.

trans-unit.source: You can implement source code control by overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: Você pode implementar o controle do código fonte, substituir esse método.

trans-unit.source: A call to OnModifying does not mean that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Modified%2A> property will later be set to `true`; it merely indicates an intention to do so.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada para OnModifying não significa que o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Modified%2A>propriedade posteriormente será definida como `true`; ela simplesmente indica uma intenção de fazê-lo.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Modified%2A>

trans-unit.source: Flushes all changes to the designer.
trans-unit.target: Libera todas as alterações para o designer.

trans-unit.source: The PerformFlush method is invoked when the designer loader needs to flush to persistence any changes made to the designers.
trans-unit.target: O método PerformFlush é invocado quando o carregador de designer precisa liberar para persistência todas as alterações feitas aos designers.

trans-unit.source: It is invoked in response to a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ele é chamado em resposta a uma chamada para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> to use for persisting the state of loaded designers.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref> a ser usado para manter o estado dos designers carregados.

trans-unit.source: Loads a designer from persistence.
trans-unit.target: Carrega um designer de persistência.

trans-unit.source: The PerformLoad method is invoked when the designer loader needs to load its state.
trans-unit.target: O método PerformLoad é invocado quando o carregador de designer precisa carregar seu estado.

trans-unit.source: PerformLoad is called before the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: PerformLoad é chamado antes de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must implement this method to load the designer contents.
trans-unit.target: Você deve implementar esse método para carregar o conteúdo do designer.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> to use for loading state for the designers.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref> a ser usado para carregar o estado para os designers.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property provider for the serialization manager being used by the loader.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o provedor de propriedade para o Gerenciador de serialização que está sendo usado pelo carregador.

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager provides a `Properties` property on its primary interface that can be read by serializers to customize their serialization to specific needs.
trans-unit.target: O Gerenciador de serialização fornece um `Properties` propriedade em sua interface principal que pode ser lido por serializadores Personalize sua serialização para necessidades específicas.

trans-unit.source: The properties that are examined by the serializers vary depending on the type of serializer used.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades que são examinadas pelos serializadores variam dependendo do tipo de serializador usado.

trans-unit.source: An object whose properties are to be provided to the serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto cujas propriedades devem ser fornecidos para o Gerenciador de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"> </xref> não foi inicializado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a reload has been queued.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se um recarregamento foi enfileirado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if a call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload*> has queued a reload request; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, se uma chamada para <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload*>colocou em fila para uma solicitação de recarregamento; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload*>

trans-unit.source: Reports errors that occurred while flushing changes.
trans-unit.target: Relatórios de erros que ocorreram durante a liberação de alterações.

trans-unit.source: The ReportFlushErrors method is called during <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> if one or more errors occurred while flushing changes.
trans-unit.target: O método ReportFlushErrors é chamado durante a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>se um ou mais erros ao liberar alterações.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: The values in the `errors` collection can be exceptions or objects with <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> values that describe the error.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de `errors` coleção pode ser exceções ou objetos com <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>valores que descrevem o erro.</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of ReportFlushErrors raises the last exception in the collection.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão de ReportFlushErrors gera a última exceção na coleção.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> containing error objects, usually exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>que contém objetos de erro, geralmente exceções.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: One or more errors occurred while flushing changes.
trans-unit.target: Um ou mais erros ao liberar alterações.

trans-unit.source: Sets the full class name of the base component.
trans-unit.target: Define o nome completo da classe do componente base.

trans-unit.source: The SetBaseComponentClassName method should be called during loading to establish the full name of the component a designer is designing.
trans-unit.target: O método SetBaseComponentClassName deve ser chamado durante o carregamento para estabelecer o nome completo do componente de que criação de um designer.

trans-unit.source: A string representing the full name of the component to be designed.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o nome completo do componente a ser criado.

trans-unit.source: name is .
trans-unit.target: nameis .

trans-unit.source: Registers an external component as part of the load process managed by <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Registra um componente externo como parte do processo de carga gerenciado pelo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A> method once for each external object participating in the load process.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A>método uma vez para cada objeto externo que participam do processo de carregamento.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A> method is called when the work of the load process is done.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A>método é chamado quando o trabalho do processo de carregamento é feito.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"> </xref> não foi inicializado.

trans-unit.source: Signals that a dependent load has finished.
trans-unit.target: Indica que uma carga dependente foi concluída.

trans-unit.source: The IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete method is called to signal that a dependent loading operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: O método IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete é chamado para sinalizar que uma operação de carregamento dependente foi concluída.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A> method once for every process that was registered by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A> method, which has already completed.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A>método uma vez para cada processo que foi registrado por chamar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A>método, que já foi concluída.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the dependent load succeeds, the caller sets the `successful` parameter to `true` and passes either an empty collection or `null` to the `errorCollection` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Se a carga dependente for bem-sucedida, os conjuntos de chamador de `successful` parâmetro `true` e passa em uma coleção vazia ou `null` para o `errorCollection` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: If the dependent load encounters errors, the caller sets the `successful` parameter to `false` and passes a collection of exceptions that indicate the reason or reasons for failure to the `errorCollection` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Se a carga dependente encontrar erros, o chamador define o `successful` parâmetro `false` e passa uma coleção de exceções que indicam o motivo ou os motivos da falha para o `errorCollection` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to load successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>carregar com êxito; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> containing errors that occurred during the load.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>que contém erros que ocorreram durante o carregamento.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: No load dependencies have been added by <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A>, or the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: Nenhuma dependência de carga foram adicionada por <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A>, ou o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"> </xref> não foi inicializado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"> </xref> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Reloads the design document.
trans-unit.target: Recarrega o documento de design.

trans-unit.source: Any object can call the IDesignerLoaderService.Reload method to request that the loader reload the design document.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer objeto pode chamar o método IDesignerLoaderService.Reload para solicitar que a recarga de carregador o documento de design.

trans-unit.source: If the loader supports reloading and complies with the reload, the designer loader can return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o carregador dá suporte ao recarregar e está em conformidade com o recarregamento, o carregador de designer pode retornar `true`.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it returns `false`, indicating that the reload will not occur.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, retornará `false`, indicando que a recarga não ocorrerá.

trans-unit.source: Callers cannot rely on the reload happening immediately; the designer loader can schedule this for some other time, or it can try to reload the designer at once.
trans-unit.target: Chamadores não podem contar com a recarga acontecendo imediatamente. o carregador de designer pode agendá-la para outro momento, ou ele pode tentar recarregar o designer de uma vez.

trans-unit.source: The caller can display a message to the user if the designer cannot be reloaded.
trans-unit.target: O chamador pode exibir uma mensagem para o usuário se o designer não pode ser recarregado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the reload request is accepted; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the loader does not allow the reload.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a solicitação de recarregamento for aceita; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o carregador não permitir a recarga.
